name: Major in Computer Science (BEng) (2016-17)
descriptions: Students are required to complete courses in the following areas.
Some courses can be used to fulfill both Major and University Common Core Requirements. Students may reuse a maximum of 6 credits to count towards both Requirements.
Student may opt to graduate with or without an option. Students who take an option MUST complete all requirements specified in addition to the major requirements.

criteria.name: MATH Course: Option A
descriptions: Students are required to take MATH 1012 / 1013 / 1023 AND MATH 1014 / 1024.

criteria.name: Area (A): Artificial Intelligence / Theory
descriptions: Students may or may not select this area. If chosen, student must take at least THREE elective courses from this area and at least TWO electives from outside that area.
Your current status is (only applicable for students selected this area):

criteria.name: Area (B): Graphic / Multimedia
descriptions: Students may or may not select this area. If chosen, student must take at least THREE elective courses from this area and at least TWO electives from outside that area.
Your current status is (only applicable for students selected this area):

criteria.name: Area (C): Software / Database
descriptions: Students may or may not select this area. If chosen, student must take at least THREE elective courses from this area and at least TWO electives from outside that area.
Your current status is (only applicable for students selected this area):

criteria.name: Area (D): Systems / Networking
descriptions: Students may or may not select this area. If chosen, student must take at least THREE elective courses from this area and at least TWO electives from outside that area.

areas.name: COMP Elective I
descriptions: Students are required to complete the following number of courses. Students must take 5 courses from the specified elective list, of which at least 3 courses should be taken from 1 area and at least 2 courses outside that area.

areas.name: Verification I: THREE courses taken from an area
descriptions: Students must take THREE courses from an area.

areas.name: Verification IIa: TWO other courses taken in another single area
descriptions: Students must either fulfill verification IIa OR IIb.

areas.name: Verification IIb: TWO other courses taken in two other areas
descriptions: Students must either fulfill verification IIa OR IIb.

criteria.name: COMP Elective
descriptions: Students are required to complete the following number of units of courses.
